title: Election 2016 exit polls : percentage of votes by gender
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 2 different Sexs for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump that are presented on the X-axis.
Sex Female had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Hillary Clinton. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Sex Male for Hillary Clinton.
Among all the Sexs, Donald Trump had the highest Percentage of votes 53.0 in Sex Male and lowest value 42.0 in Sex Female.
Sex Male and Female had the biggest gap of 11.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Donald Trump.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Sexs on X-axis for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
In Sex Female, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes 54.0 among the 2 groups and in Male, Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes 41.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of votes on the Y-axis for 2 different Sexs for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump that are presented on the X-axis.
Sex Female had the maximum Percentage of votes among all 2 groups, and it was for Hillary Clinton. The minimum Percentage of votes was observed in Sex Male for Hillary Clinton.
Among all the Sexs, Donald Trump had the highest Percentage of votes 53.0 in Sex Male and lowest value 42.0 in Sex Female.
Sex Male and Female had the biggest gap of 11.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Donald Trump.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Sexs on X-axis for 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of votes.
In Sex Female, Hillary Clinton had the highest Percentage of votes 54.0 among the 2 groups and in Male, Hillary Clinton had the lowest Percentage of votes 41.0.
Among all the Sexs, Donald Trump had the highest Percentage of votes 53.0 in Sex Male and lowest value 42.0 in Sex Female.
There is a gap of 11.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of votes found for Donald Trump in Sex Male and Female.
Among all 2 groups, Hillary Clinton had the gap of 13.0 between the maximum and minimum Percentage of votes observed in Sex Female and Male respectively.
On average, the Sex Female had the highest Percentage of votes for all 2 groups Hillary Clinton, and Donald Trump. Whereas Male had the lowest average Percentage of votes.
